verses.verse: Though <S%G1437><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5725><s%> with the tongues <S%G1100><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of angels <S%G32><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5725><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> charity <S%G26><s%>, I am become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> as sounding <S%G2278><s%> <S%G5723><s%> brass <S%G5475><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> a tinkling <S%G214><s%> <S%G5723><s%> cymbal <S%G2950><s%>.

Charity <S%G26><s%> suffereth long <S%G3114><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and is kind <S%G5541><s%> <S%G5736><s%>; charity <S%G26><s%> envieth <S%G2206><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>; charity <S%G26><s%> vaunteth <S%G4068><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> itself <S%G4068><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, is <S%G5448><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> puffed up <S%G5448><s%> <S%G5743><s%>,
